name: Ice Breaker: Nuclear Winter
description:
Ice Breaker: Nuclear Winter

A small game made for GPJam2018!

It took me 3 days with very little sleep.

Special Features: Online Highscore

Description:

A time-racer game made for the GPJam2018

How To Play:

Goal:
Collet the 3 Cargo Containers located at 3 different facilities as fast as possible and bring them back to the nuclear power plant to prevent the  nuclear reactor from detonating and causing massive havoc.
But beware of breaking shelf ice, and other difficultys

Collect Power-Ups to turn back time and get a higher score.

Controls:

Use Arrow Keys / WASD to move.
Spacebar = Handbrake
ESC = Quit To Menu
Enter = Pause Game

Story

Reactor Malfunction System 7.

Critical Mass reached in 2 Minutes.

Hey Driver, you have to get our replacement parts to fix the nuclear reactor. They are located at 3 different facillitys around the ice shelf. You are our last hope. Get them in time to save the life of hundreds!! But beware... the ice shelf is very thin, so drive carefully!
